_id.title: The unique id of the dataset. If it is possible, it should be something meaningful

_schema.title: The JSON schema absolute URI. It must match the value of 'id' in the JSON schema

community_id.title: The community where this dataset was generated or used

challenge_id.title: The challenge where this dataset was generated or used

visibility.title: The visibility of this dataset, which must be acknowledged by the APIs

version.title: Version (or relelase date) of the dataset

modification.title: Last modification date of the dataset

public.title: The date when this dataset becomes public

datalink.title: The link to reach the dataset

uri.title: Either inline, encoded data URI, or download link to the dataset itself, or to a Metalink, a MD5/SHA1 sums file, or an official CURIE

schema_url.title: The optional URL to the JSON Schema which validates the inline data

attrs.title: Attributes describing the datalink: whether it is inline (i.e. a data URI); a CURIE; whether it is compressed, or an archive (tar, zip, rar), a metalink o a standard sums (MD5, SHA1) file

validation_date.title: Last validation date of the datalink

status.title: Last validation status (unreachable content, missing content(404), interrupted while validating, corrupted (checksums, not all the contents available, etc...), ok)

dataset_contact_ids.title: The contact id(s) of the depositor(s)/creator(s) of this dataset

depends_on.title: The causal, direct dependencies of this dataset on a tool and other datasets, if available

metrics_id.title: The id of the metrics tied to the tool id

tool_id.title: The id of the tool which generated this dataset

dataset_id.title: The id of a dataset which was used to generate this new dataset

role.title: The role of the referenced dataset generating the current one (used to generate the current dataset, superseded by the generated dataset, ....)

references.title: The reference id(s) of this dataset (if any)
